entry.title: $2449 // Brand new listing- tasteful renovations just finished! True 2BR
entry.content:
Call or text today: six four sixx for o 7 too one 5 too

2 Bed / 1 Bath at 177 Hopkins St, Brooklyn, NY 11206, USA in Williamsburg, Brooklyn. Pets Upon Approval. Brand new listing- tasteful renovations just finished! True 2BR (not railroad) Large bedrooms on opposite ends of apartment with private outdoor space. Oversized bedrooms w/ great closets. Commuter's dream; only a couple minutes walk from the Flushing G, Flushing J/M, or the Lorimer J train. 15 minutes to Manhattan including walking. In Bedstuy, exactly 1 block below South Williamsburg. H&HW inc. Text to schedule and appointment. *Pictures are of left side, avail is right side apt, almost same* We can help you find roommates.

entry.content:
MUST SEE!!
NO BROKER FEE!!

ABOUT THE PLACE

2 Bed / 1 Bath at Bushwick Ave, Brooklyn, NY 11206, USA in Bushwick, Brooklyn. All Pets Allowed. A stunning conversion of a 19th Century church nested in a prime Brooklyn location. Many different layouts available across three different buildings. All featuring; Airy loft layouts, new oak floors, GE appliances, central air and heat. Surrounded by convenient neighborhood amenities, galleries, restaurants, coffee shops and bars too. All of this an easy 15 minutes to downtown Manhattan via the J Express train. *Net Effective Pricing Based on 6 Weeks Free on a 12 Month Lease Agreement*
